description: Any non-200 responses in the OpenStack API are wrapped in OpenStack Faults (JSON or XML response bodies with code/detail/message.)  500s are supposed to behave that way as well, but they don't -- you get a stack trace and regular HTML.
title: OpenStack API does not give JSON/XML output for 500s
